education_text.0: From September 1989 to August 1990, Hewitt was the IBM Chair Visiting Professor in the Department of Computer Science at      Keio University Keio University in JapanFrom September 1989 to August 1990, Hewitt was the IBM Chair Visiting Professor in the Department of Computer Science at      Keio University Keio University in JapanThe Planner language was developed during the late 1960s as part of Hewitt's doctoral research in MIT's Artificial Intelligence Laboratory
